title: Silver bot lane player LFT
body:
Looking for a team to play with, sick and tired of trolls/feeders/flamers. 

Currently in silver 4 and struggling with trolls and feeders. Was previously silver 1.

I can play both adc and support at a high standard. My best adc's are hypercarries like jinx, cait and kog where positioning is key. My best supports include thresh, brand, morg and ali, pretty much kill lane bot.

If you have a team and are looking for one more person for bot lane, please feel free to add me. :)
